⚠️ **PLEASE DO NOT CREATE PUBLIC ISSUES FOR SECURITY VULNERABILITIES**

Instead, email: security@agi-tracker.app

---

If this is a security issue that has already been patched and you're documenting it:

## Summary

Brief description of the vulnerability.

## Severity

- [ ] Critical
- [ ] High  
- [ ] Medium
- [ ] Low

## Status

- [ ] Reported
- [ ] Confirmed
- [ ] Fixed
- [ ] Disclosed

## Reference

Link to security advisory or CVE (if applicable).
